camzup.core  

  • Uses of Utils.PeriodicEasing in camzup.core

    Subclasses of Utils.PeriodicEasing in camzup.core 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Utils.LerpCCW
    Linear interpolation for a periodic value in the counter-clockwise direction.
    static class  Utils.LerpCW
    Linear interpolation for a periodic value in the clockwise direction.
    static class  Utils.LerpNear
    Linear interpolation for a periodic value in the nearest direction.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Transform2 Transform2.rotateTo​(float radians, float step, Utils.PeriodicEasing easingFunc)
    Rotates the transform to a new orientation by a step in [0.0, 1.0] using the specified easing function.
